link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK(File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 服务退出后无法显示任何图像 (自 v1.9.1 起)
  2. 改进 显示收藏夹中丢失或删除歌曲的路径而不是完全空白
  3. 新增 支持清理收藏夹中丢失或删除的歌曲
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: No images could be displayed once service exits (since v1.9.1)
  2. Improve: show paths of the missing (deleted) songs instead of complete blank in Favorites Playlist
  3. New: support cleaning the missing (deleted) songs in Favorites Playlist

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK(File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 后台随机崩溃
  2. 修复 部分设备上重启后崩溃
  3. 修复 部分设备上从后台切换回来后崩溃
  4. 修复 时间戳相同的多行 lrc 歌词将被最后一行覆盖
  5. 修复 当前播放的歌曲发生改变且无歌词时，歌词对话框崩溃
  6. 修复 排序导致的文件页部分文件不显示
  7. 改进 文件页加载速度
  8. 翻译 更新 法语 (Vividly8487), 葡萄牙语 (azilara)
  9. 开发 更新依赖, 清理代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: random crashes from background
  2. Fix: possible crashes after rebooting on some devices
  3. Fix: possible crashes after switching back from background on some devices
  4. Fix: lrc lyrics with same timestamp would be overridden with last one
  5. Fix: crashes of Lyrics Dialog when current song changed but it has no lyrics
  6. Fix: possibly some files are missing in Files tab due to sorting
  7. Improve: performance of loading in Files tab
  8. Translation: update French (by Vividly8487), Portuguese (by azilara)
  9. Development: update dependencies, cleanup codes

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK(File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 开发 targetSdk 35 (Android 15)
  2. 修复 某些情况下拖动列表项目时可能导致崩溃
  3. 修复 拖动播放列表项目却不在编辑模式下
  4. 修复 从多选进入标签编辑器但所选内容不含任何歌曲时崩溃
  5. 修复 播放队列清空后, 从某些通知或蓝牙设备切换曲目时崩溃
  6. 修复 部分设备上最常听的歌曲和最近播放播放列表乱序
  7. 修复 文件夹页缺失自动刷新
  8. 新增 关于中显示当前变体版本
  9. 新增 更新对话框中标出当前变体版本和通道
  10. 改进 搜索界面中显示底部播放器
  11. 改进 版本迁移用户界面
  12. 改进 启用新的系统返回手势动画 (Android T 及以上)
  13. 改进 边到边界面
  14. 删除 设置项“着色导航栏” (已无意义)
  15. 修改 默认着色导航栏
  16. 修改 若可行, 透明或半透明导航栏
  17. 修改 默认文件播放列表图标
  18. 修改 禁止从 v1.4.0 之前的版本升级, 警告从 v1.7.0 之前的版本升级
  19. 翻译 更新 波兰语 (cooky), 巴西葡萄牙语 (FalaTudo, Ulisses_Mello), 西班牙语 (Ulisses_Mello)
  20. 开发 更新依赖
releaseNote.en:
1. Development: Targeting SDK 35 (Android 15)
  2. Fix: possible crashes when dragging items in some circumstances
  3. Fix: dragging playlist items but not in Edit Mode
  4. Fix: crash when entering Tag Editor from multi-selection mode but the selection contains no song
  5. Fix: crash after skipping from some notifications or BT devices but queue is empty
  6. Fix: incorrect sorting order of My Top Tracks and Recently Played on some devices
  7. Fix: missing automatic refresh in Folders tab
  8. New: display current distribution Variant in About
  9. New: mark current distribution Variant and Channel in Upgrade Dialog
  10. Improve: show bottom sliding panel in Search
  11. Improve: explicit user interface for version migration
  12. Improve: enable new system back gesture animations for Android T and above
  13. Improve: edge to edge user interface
  14. Remove: preference "colored navigation bar" (not applicable now)
  15. Modify: navigation bar would always be colored by default
  16. Modify: navigation bar would be transparent or translucent if possible now
  17. Modify: change default File Playlist icon
  18. Modify: forbid upgrading from prior to v1.4.0 & warn upgrading from prior to v1.7.0
  19. Translation: update Polish (cooky), Portuguese Brazilian (by FalaTudo, Ulisses_Mello), Spanish (by Ulisses_Mello)
  20. Development: update dependencies
